intro.firstPageLabel: Did you happen to forget which set you were on during your workout?
intro.thirdPageLabel: Let me know your sets and how long you plan to rest, and I'll assist you!
intro.fourthPageLabel: Oh, and if you have any isometric exercises or specific execution times, please let me know as well!
intro.notificationPermission: Oh, I almost forgot! For a better experience, you will receive notifications about what's happening. If you wish to disable the notifications, you can go to the settings and edit the app permissions.

timerPage.setsHelp: This is where you can select the total number of sets to be performed.
timerPage.restHelp: This is where you define the total rest duration for each set, in minutes and seconds.
timerPage.isometricsHelp: This is where you define the duration of isometric or execution exercises. For example, an isometric exercise could be a plank, and an execution exercise could be running.
timerPage.autoRestHelp: This is where you can choose whether the rest time should automatically begin after the isometric or execution exercise time has ended, if applicable.
timerPage.stepHelp: These are the exercises that can be defined or have already been defined. If an exercise has been defined, you can click on the corresponding number to edit it.

exerciseListSettingPage.stepQuantityHelp: This indicates the number of exercises to be performed.

timeCountPage.timeBeep: When the timer reaches 10 seconds, it will emit a single beep. During the last 3 seconds, it will beep once per second.

stepPage.cancelDescription: Do you really want to stop setting your exercises?

exerciseTimer.cancelDescription: Do you really want to stop the current exercise?

notification.executionFinishedBody: Execution/isometric exercise finished. Let's rest of set

closeAppDescription: Do you really want to close your counting?
